name: Steven Quebek
comment: Holy cow, this was thrilling! It was very difficult, but super rewarding! My mother-in-law fell down the ravine and we haven't heard from here since.

name: Ivana Kindl
comment: Well, compared to Zrmanja rafting, this was a pleasant surprise. Jacques couldn't really climb, so it was just me this time, and it was great. I climbed, like, 200m up top and the view was fascinating.

name: Pamela Anderson
comment: I wasn't very happy with the instructor, she didn't really pay any attention to me. Although, the view is nice once you get to the top of the rock.

name: Susan Green
comment: I went to this park with my Christian friends and we had a fairly good time. I had my praying beads with me all the time, just in case I fall down. Luckily, that didn't happen.

name: Toni Cetinski
comment: I'm not very fond of heights, so I was nauseous all the time and almost started to vomit half-way to the top. I guess it's just me, but I like Zrmanja better.

name: Bob Rosemary
comment: Ugh, I didn't like this. I nearly slipped and fell down the ravine, my instructor forgot to fasten my belt! Jesus Christ, I'm lucky I survived. Do NOT go here, these people will kill you accidentally!

name: Joey Diaz
comment: Let me tell you something, Joe Rogan. This was tremendous. I had such an exciting time, I stood up at the top of the mountain and yelled like that time I was overdosed on cocaine back in '87 on West Boulevard

name: Mate Miso Kovac
comment: Stankovicu, kad sam se ja uspeo uz tu stijenu, cvrstu, pradavnu, pomislio sam to je to. Stankovicu, nebo se spojilo sa zemljom, ovako nesto se dogodi samo jednom u zivotu.

name: Matea Kovacevic
comment: I'm a regular visitor here, I love the outdoors and the climb is exhausting but rewarding. Unfortunately, the guest house didn't have any cevap dish, and I was really looking forward to it...

name: Sime Martinov
comment: Ne razumijem ljude koji ovo rade, cemu ova tortura i patnja? Platio sam valjda 200 kuna da se izubijam i da tjedan dana kasnije ne mogu sjesti na WC skoljku od bolova. Nisam bas fan.

name: Ivica Kustura
comment: Odlicna stijena za penjanje, ali moram primjetiti da je alarmantan nedostatak sanitarnih cvorova po stazi. Bilo bi u redu da barem jedan mali WC stave na pola puta do vrha stijene.

name: Ana Strenja
comment: Ovo je bilo odlicno! Prijavila sam se za najtezu rutu i potpuno me iscrpilo, ali pogled je odlican. Steta sto sam u jednom trenu vidila covjeka kako vrsi nuzdu na vrh brda, mislim da je to bio Ivica

name: Ivan Grzan
comment: Bilo je dobro, penja san se do vrha, ali nazalost nisan dobro zatvorija dzepove od jakete u kojoj su mi bili sendvici i do vrha planine mi je vecina sendvica ispala doli, dvista metara ispod
